head.title: Have Your Mommy Call My Mommy

hedline.hl1: Have Your Mommy Call My Mommy

abstract.p: Stationery designed by Sarah Delson has footprints of her infant daughter; photo (S)

block.p: Veronika Dorothea Kramer, 2 months, has something most babies do not -- a business card. Profession: baby. Her mother, Sarah Delson, a graphic designer at St. Martin's Press in Manhattan, put Veronika's footprints on a digital scanner, reduced the image, then designed and laser-printed the cards. She and her husband, Larry Kramer, a law professor at New York University, sent out 150. ''Anyone can do this on a computer,'' Ms. Delson said: $39 for 1,000 blank cards at Staples.
